page.title: 07Interview- school leaver
page.content: We chose to interview Blair because she was at Shipbourne School and she now has an interesting job.After leaving school she went to work at Fairlawn Home Farm where there are 2200 acres of arable,beef and sheep. She does many jobs including mucking out the cows,littering up,lambing and harvesting.In the summer Blair works very long hours and in the winter works from 8.00am till 5.00pm. Blair has had some adventures at work.Once when she was in a field a fire started and she had to beat it down and call for help on her C.B. Another time she was in her tractor and sliding down a hill so she had to change gear quickly.Blair leaves Fairlawn in September and goes to the Harper Adams Agricultural College where she will train to be an agricultural engineer. James.
